subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Judge Susan Illston barred the jury at Barry Bonds’s perjury trial from hearing angry voice-mail messages he left his mistress during their nine-year relationship.
snippet: Judge Susan Illston barred the jury at Barry Bonds’s perjury trial from hearing angry voice-mail messages he left his mistress during their nine-year relationship.
